column5: i always see that advertisement of the bounty fishing on here. i finally gave in and registered and who knows i might win some cash. has anyone else joined? and has anyone actually competed and maybe even won some cash?

I just joined on Monday.. and registered for the free week tourments..   But if you look at the winners list there are alot of Canadians on there and one from like Manitoba thats won like $27,000 so far!  Be sure you read all the regs for the photos and such before you submit them!

Hey guys ... Yup it's all true Bounty is awesome!!! I go by fishing4tails under bounty site as well. The tounaments are great as you can fish at your own time and release your fish!! l have won lots of money the past couple of years so Bounty has been great for me!! As a multi species angler they have tournament for all of us!! If you sign up please send me message to say hi !! Www.bountyfishing.com Www.fishing4tails.com
Looks like a good money-maker for the people runnng it...

I checked it out, but haven't registered yet.  I might, but I'm not sure if it will make fishing a little less enjoyable.  I'm sure the guys that have racked up $20K aren't fishing only during the FREE weeks...I'd like to know how much they've spent.  Interesting angle nonetheless

Planning to try this season. Always wanted to join a tournament but never wanted to pay the big fees. This way is a (pay as you go tournament). I sure will fish better knowing that theres money on the line.  Good luck  Look for Ronin Fisher
I wonder what you get for the free weeks?  A pat on the back?
what do you pay for a week/day?
Check out the link. It will show you the prize levels for each week. Of course the "Free Weeks" are much lower, but hey.. money is money..  Bounty Fishing - Prizes
